Title: Authorizes the Congregation Khal Mevakshei Hashem, Inc. to receive retroactive real property tax exempt status
Summary: Authorizes the Congregation Khal Mevakshei Hashem, Inc. to receive retroactive real property tax exempt status for the 2024 assessment roll and all of the 2023-2024 school taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the Congregation Khal Mevakshei Hashem, Inc. to receive retroactive real property tax exempt status
